title: feat: add agent thinking content display of deepseek R1

body:
# Summary

> [!Tip]
> Close issue syntax: `Fixes #<issue number>` or `Resolves #<issue number>`, see [documentation](https://docs.github.com/en/issues/tracking-your-work-with-issues/linking-a-pull-request-to-an-issue#linking-a-pull-request-to-an-issue-using-a-keyword) for more details.

fix https://github.com/langgenius/dify/issues/12891

It will wrap the thinking content with markdown's quote

# Screenshots

| Before | After |
|--------|-------|
| ![9644ea12add88b4e255580be88331a8](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4426b753-a110-4e35-a491-fa2cca243017)   | ![f21c6f1ab9400bec78576dd09a37678](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/50865e3d-9e06-45c0-a334-3544fc4c0a68)|

# Checklist

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Please review the checklist below before submitting your pull request.

- [ ] This change requires a documentation update, included: [Dify Document](https://github.com/langgenius/dify-docs)
- [x] I understand that this PR may be closed in case there was no previous discussion or issues. (This doesn't apply to typos!)
- [x] I've added a test for each change that was introduced, and I tried as much as possible to make a single atomic change.
- [x] I've updated the documentation accordingly.
- [x] I ran `dev/reformat`(backend) and `cd web && npx lint-staged`(frontend) to appease the lint gods

Thank you for your efforts, but I am curious about the DeepSeek-R1 deployed by Ollama. The <think> tag display is still incorrect. Will there be continuing repair plans?

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ee08d970-0aca-44f0-83f3-cd13d0fb6921)

> Thank you for your efforts, but I am curious about the DeepSeek-R1 deployed by Ollama. The tag display is still incorrect. Will there be continuing repair plans?

My Ollama doesn't have enough GPU power to run DeepSeek-R1. Perhaps someone else could implement this feature.
